name: King Chaser
description:
A multiplayer turn based strategy game of cat and mouse, set in a world of magical creatures. Player 1 controls the King who must escape Player 2, a monster who can create obstacles to block the King’s path.  

Long ago, a great warrior defeated an unholy Kraken beast, Lord Octomus and sealed him beneath the earth. The people made the warrior, King of all the land, and the land prospered under his rule. Peace reigned for an age...until a foolish mortal broke Lord Octomus free. Lord Octomus has risen and with his great unholy tentacles he seeks the destruction of the New King, the only one who can seal him away.
